title: Kidult Eva Mendes In Fucky Kidulthood Poster With Anne Hathaway &  Denise Richards Beg Rachel McAdams: "Let Naomi Watts, Matthew McConaughey, Tara Reid & Monica Bellucci Calendar Sex Movies Biography"
description: Fuck. It's one of those words that sounds completely made up; as if pulled from the pages of a Nigel Tomm's abstract novel - but in fact, quite the opposite is true. Reading Nigel Tomm is a small adventure that one undertakes before doing something profoundly conventional. For Eva Mendes, Anne Hathaway, Denise Richards, Rachel McAdams, Naomi Watts, Matthew McConaughey, Tara Reid and Monica Bellucci the present book is 99.995% reality and 0.005% art. For the rest it's 99.995% art and 0.005% reality. Here you leave today and enter the world of yesterday, tomorrow and fantasy. This is twisted abstract literature at its best.
author: Nigel Tomm
